section.title: Apache Forrest - RTF Plugin
section.p: This plugin allows Forrest files to be output in RTF format.

section.title: How to Use the RTF Plugin
section.p: Currently, there is no auto-install feature for the RTF plugin since it is pre-alpha. For installation instructions see the README.txt file.
Once you have the RTF plugin installed, it is simply a case of requesting a file with an rtf extension. For example, samples/minimal.rtf.
section.warning: Currently, the Forrest generated fo files are not working in this RTF plugin. See the To Do List for more details.
